fields.label: Builder
fields.name: builder
fields.instructions: Build your page with predefined modules. Drag and drop to rearrange.

sub_fields.label: Article Categories
sub_fields.message: This module will display a list of available article categories.

sub_fields.label: Choose Banner
sub_fields.name: choose_banner
sub_fields.instructions:
Choose which banner to use in this module.

If you want to edit this banner or create a new one, choose "Banners" in the main menu to the left.

choices.is_logged_in: Display banner if user is logged in
choices.is_logged_out: Display banner if user is not logged in

sub_fields.label: Number Box
sub_fields.name: number_box
sub_fields.message: Kryss av for å nummerere boksen

sub_fields.label: Accent Background Color
sub_fields.name: accent_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Velg bakgrunnsfargen til nummerering og knapp

sub_fields.label: Accent Text Color
sub_fields.name: accent_text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Velg tekstfargen til nummerering og knapp

sub_fields.label: Inverted Colors?
sub_fields.name: inverted_colors
sub_fields.message: Check this if these articles should display with inverted colors

sub_fields.label: Choose Articles Grid
sub_fields.name: choose_articles_grid
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the grid that the news articles will display at larger screen sizes.

sub_fields.label: Featured Article
sub_fields.name: featured_article
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which article that will be displayed as the main article in this section.

sub_fields.label: Only display articles from this subject
sub_fields.name: articles_from_subject

sub_fields.label: Choose specific articles
sub_fields.name: choose_specific_articles
sub_fields.instructions: Choose specific articles to be displayed. This field overrides these fields:  "additional articles", "Only display articles from this category", "Sort articles by" and "skip articles".

sub_fields.label: Education Filters
sub_fields.message: This module will display a list of available education categories as well as a search input.

sub_fields.label: Display Search
sub_fields.name: display_search
sub_fields.message: Check this to let users search for articles

sub_fields.label: Which List would you like to collect emails to?
sub_fields.name: email_list

sub_fields.label: Choose Publications
sub_fields.name: choose_publications
sub_fields.instructions: Here we list digital publications/bokasins to users. Keep in mind that anyone will be able to view these, even if the user is not logged in or registered as a member.

sub_fields.label: Publications Description
sub_fields.name: publications_description
sub_fields.instructions: Add a WYSIWYG description before listing the publications.

sub_fields.label: Log in form
sub_fields.message: This module displays a log in form when user is not logged in.

sub_fields.label: Logos
sub_fields.name: logos
sub_fields.instructions: This module will add a section with logos from the most prominent bokasins. Choose Logo Images and link them to the correct article category.

sub_fields.label: Inverted Colors?
sub_fields.name: inverted_colors
sub_fields.message: Check this if these articles should display with inverted colors

sub_fields.label: Choose Articles Grid
sub_fields.name: choose_articles_grid
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the grid that the news articles will display at larger screen sizes.

sub_fields.label: Featured Article
sub_fields.name: featured_article
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which article that will be displayed as the main article in this section.

sub_fields.label: Only display articles from this category
sub_fields.name: articles_from_category

sub_fields.label: Choose specific articles
sub_fields.name: choose_specific_articles
sub_fields.instructions: Choose specific articles to be displayed. This field overrides these fields:  "additional articles", "Only display articles from this category", "Sort articles by" and "skip articles".

sub_fields.label: Choose articles
sub_fields.name: choose_articles
sub_fields.instructions: Choose specific articles to be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.placeholder: Read the latest from Top Gear

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.placeholder: Read the latest from Top Gear

sub_fields.label: Registration Form
sub_fields.message: This module displays a registration form.

sub_fields.label: Selling Point
sub_fields.name: selling_point
sub_fields.instructions: Add selling points. Icons and text.

sub_fields.label: Publication Category
sub_fields.name: publication_category
sub_fields.instructions: Choose 1 or several categories to pick from.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.placeholder: Our latest releases – available on bokasin.no
